title: PGIMER Chandigarh Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for NHM Survey Data Field Collector Post
description: Post Graduate Institute of Medical Education and Research, Chandigarh (PGIMER Chandigarh) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for NHM Survey Data Field Collector Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS, BAMS, BDS, Any Degree, Post Graduation, and utilize this opportunity and apply for these posts. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the PGIMER Chandigar...
